plot: This film follows the Nation's top ranked Drifters on and off the track. It shows the journey of a Drift enthusiast building his car and learning from his mentors, Samuel Hubinette and Ken Gushi.
title: Drift: The Sideways Craze
plot_es: This film follows the Nation's top ranked Drifters on and off the track. It shows the journey of a Drift enthusiast building his car and learning from his mentors, Samuel Hubinette and Ken Gushi.
plot_en: This film follows the Nation's top ranked Drifters on and off the track. It shows the journey of a Drift enthusiast building his car and learning from his mentors, Samuel Hubinette and Ken Gushi.
